message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this exceptional product at a price that reflects its value.  I'm starting with $1750000. This gives you a great opportunity to acquire this asset at a competitive price, and I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your portfolio. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. This is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1600000 is a step in the right direction, I'm still slightly above my minimum.  Let's meet in the middle at $1650000. This price reflects the product's exceptional value and allows for a mutually beneficial outcome. I'm confident we can reach a final agreement if we work together.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1620000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1630000. This offer is very close to your last proposal and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's finalize this deal so we can both move forward.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1610000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my financial constraints.

Bob, I'm glad we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1620000. This price acknowledges your financial constraints and allows me to achieve a fair return on this valuable product. Let's close this deal and move forward.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my financial constraints.
